stories.text:
I am the founder of a P2P sports and social betting platform that allows friends and strangers to bet real money on sports, politics, pop culture, and other events electronically. Think of it as a more interactive version of Venmo, with a focus on betting: the ultimate "put-your-money-where-your-mouth-is" platform.

I am looking to hire a full-stack Lead Software Engineer who will be the first full-time technical hire at our company. This person would have equity in the company and would lead the future tech team. Our company has a beta app launched and is currently raising our first round of outside capital.

Our tech stack is as follows: Back-End = Laravel Framework: PHP/SQL Front-End = Flutter (though we’re in the process of moving to React)

This is a high risk/reward situation, but there's a ton of upside here. This space is booming and I truly think we can turn this into a $100mm+ exit.

If interested in hearing more, please email support@kutt.com.

https://kutt.com
stories.title: Looking for a lead engineer at a P2P sports betting startup
Hunting Squares – The Lehmer Factoring Engines

stories.text:
I spent the morning just overwhelming myself with the possibilities.

I want to strike the right balance of leveraging SaaS and cloud, while avoiding being locked into a particular cloud provider.

If you need to set up a production-ready web app with auth{n,z}, accounts- what are the first tools you consider? More interested in folks thoughts than solutioning anything particular for myself.
stories.title: Ask HN: Go-to web stack for 1-person startup
